code: import axios from"axios";var url="/api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(url);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(numberObject){var request=axios.post(url,numberObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var remove=function remove(id){var deleteUrl="".concat(url,"/").concat(id);var request=axios.delete(deleteUrl,id);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(updatedNumberObject,id){var updateUrl="".concat(url,"/").concat(id);var request=axios.put(updateUrl,updatedNumberObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,remove:remove,update:update};
